pr_title: agility: Add config for Sepulchre obstacles and skill obstacles

timeline.bodyText: Maybe add a "Hallowed Sepulchre" config section since "Projectile Color" on its own doesn't really mean anything in this plugin, and having four sepulchre configs is starting to get a bit busy at the bottom of this config.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -234,12 +234,34 @@ default boolean highlightSepulchreNpcs()
 
 	@ConfigItem(
 		keyName = "sepulchreHighlightColor",
-		name = "Sepulchre Highlight",
+		name = "Projectile Color",

replies.bodyText: By adding the config section, it makes "Sepulchre" redundant in the config names, so those can probably be removed. Thoughts?
replies.author: Broooklyn

replies.bodyText: I think that you have renamed this in the wrong commit.
replies.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: @Adam- Should hopefully be fixed now, thanks for pointing this out.
replies.author: Broooklyn

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java
index e0d157704..20c053613 100644
--- a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java
+++ b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java

@@ -236,7 +245,8 @@ public interface AgilityConfig extends Config
 		keyName = "sepulchreHighlightColor",
 		name = "Projectile Color",
 		description = "Overlay color for arrows and swords",
-		position = 16
+		position = 16,
+		section = sepulchreSection
 	)
 	default Color sepulchreHighlightColor()
 	{

timeline.message: agility: Add config section for Sepulchre
agility: Add config section for Sepulchre

timeline.bodyText:
You already have the section name defined in a variable, use that here.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		name = "Hallowed Sepulchre",
          
          
            
            		name = seepulchreSection,
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: That'd be an illegal forward reference
replies.author: Broooklyn

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java
index 5df21884f..de9962d67 100644
--- a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java
+++ b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/agility/AgilityConfig.java

@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ public interface AgilityConfig extends Config
 	@ConfigSection(
 		name = "Hallowed Sepulchre",
 		description = "Settings for Hallowed Sepulchre highlights",
-		position = 15
+		position = 17
 	)
 	String sepulchreSection = "Hallowed Sepulchre";

timeline.message: agility: Add config section for Sepulchre
agility: Add config section for Sepulchre

agility: Add config for Sepulchre obstacles and skill obstacles

This commit moves Sepulchre obstacle IDs into a separate set so their
highlighting can be toggled separately. It also adds a toggle to
highlight Sepulchre skill obstacles.
agility: Add Hallowed Sepulchre config section
agility: Add Hallowed Sepulchre config section
